game.name: Thug Life
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Step into the gritty underworld of New York. Build your reputation from the ground up — fight, steal, and rise through the ranks of dangerous gangs or form your own crew. Every action shapes your fate in a living, reactive city full of chaos and crime.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into the gritty underworld of New York. Build your reputation from the ground up — fight, steal, and rise through the ranks of dangerous gangs or form your own crew. Every action shapes your fate in a living, reactive city full of chaos and crime.
